20101213061051.000|20101213061054.333|CCO|>>> LIFE FOR ANDREW BAGBY WAS 
20101213061054.333|20101213061057.667|CCO|GOOD.
20101213061057.667|20101213061101.000|CCO|HIS MEDICAL STUDIES IN 
20101213061101.000|20101213061102.250|CCO|NEWFOUNDLAND WERE COMPLETE.
20101213061102.250|20101213061103.500|CCO|HE RETURNED TO THE U.S. AND 
20101213061103.500|20101213061104.750|CCO|DISCOVERED A PASSION FOR FAMILY 
20101213061104.750|20101213061106.000|CCO|PRACTICE, HIS LOVE FOR PEOPLE 
20101213061106.000|20101213061107.250|CCO|AND THEIRS FOR HIM SEEMED AS 
20101213061107.250|20101213061108.500|CCO|NATURAL, AS COMFORTABLE AS THE 
20101213061108.500|20101213061109.750|CCO|QUIET TOWN IN PENNSYLVANIA IN
